name: Sidar Jabari of Zhalfir
role: "Eminence - Whenever you attack with one or more Knights
column9: if Sidar Jabari of Zhalfir is in the command zone or on the battlefield
column11: then discard a card. Whenever Sidar Jabari deals combat damage to a player
column12: return target Knight creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield"
